mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.prop_id AS "propertyInfo.id", a.value AS "value", a.code AS "code", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate"
left join sys_property_info spi on a.prop_id = spi.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_prop_value( id, prop_id, value, code, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{propertyInfo.id}, #{value}, #{code}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_prop_value SET prop_id = #{propertyInfo.id}, value = #{value}, code = #{code}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
